summary: No marine brother should have to wander Skyrim without his battle armor. Here, take this with you.
descriptionHtml:
Dwarven Armor Ultramarine ReTex
By Jerm

UPDATES: 18thJan2012 - Added the dagger, greatsword and handaxe. Almost a complete set. You might ask, \"But Jerm! Why is there no force texture on the dagger?\". 

Let me start by mentioning, force weapons are hallowed artifacts bestowed on brother marines who have slain a chaos demon. Now let us imagine for a moment, one Brother Ignacius, who has slain a mighty chaos demon with his might, faith and trusty chainsword.

The chapter Chaplain blesses Brother Ignacius as a techpriest reverantly present to him from the chapter\'s hallowed vaults: A mighty force DAGGER. I think Brother Ignacius would feel cheated. So no, for lore reasons, force daggers don\'t exist. It\'s a combat knife I guess.

5thJan2012 - Happy belated New Year guys. I know, I know I haven\'t updated in a while. Been busy with the holidays and stuff. But here\'s a small update on the weapons set. I recolored the dwarven arrows, bow and battleaxe. I know the bow and arrows are not storm bolters, but they do bear the imperial insignia and effective enough in eradicating Skyrim of dirty xenos. 

I did what I could for the battleaxe, but honestly, it\'s rather plain looking. Oh well.

22ndDec2011 - Finish retex for the dwarven sword. I tried to go for a force weapon look but unfortunately, animated textures are not yet possible. But this should be enough for most of you guys to wank off while shouting the Emperor\'s name.

17thDec2011 - Finish the armor retex for both male and female. There\'s still a persistent problem of females not using the proper armor mesh which I\'ll leave till the CK is out. Weapons to be out soon.

16thDec2011 - Finally finished the shield recolor. I\'m thinking of updating the armor a bit with a few skulls here or there. I\'ll release it with the female helm.

13thDec2011 - I grabbed some awesome skull and marine chapter decals off the web (among other things you get off the web). Deciding where to place them for best effect. I will be retexturing the shield next so keep posted.

\"Beware the alien, the mutant, the heretic.\" -- Brother-Captain Davian Thule

\"ENDORSE THIS OR DIE!!\" -- The Emperor.

The enemies of Skyrim will tremble, and we shall crush them with the might of the Emperor\'s mailed fist.

Release - 0.1: Initial release.
 0.2: Added the boots.
 0.3: Added gauntlets. And new pictures.
 1.0: Complete set retextured.
 1.1: Completed dwarven shield. Just female helm to go. 
 1.3: Hmmm.. seemed to have skipped a number here. Mehh.. Armor all done for male and female.
 1.31: Dwarven sword done.	
What: This is a retex (or re-color, actually) of the Dwarven Armor into the Ultramarine Chapter colors. Also added an imperial eagle decal to the chest plate. Check out the screenshot to see what I\'m talking about.

Why: Because the EMPEROR wills it. And I have free time during lunch breaks.
author: Jerm
